As the Predacons move off, they too feel the heat and breath of the explosi=
on behind them, but for them it has a very different meaning, they are now =
without a home, without a place to return to. 

Cyclonus flew up next to Hy=
dras, his boosters flaring brightly in the skies as he maneuvered himself. =


As Cyclonus talked Scourge fell back to the other Predacons, falling even=
 with the massive form of Deepstryke who was still in gun mode. Phobia and =
the other sweeps fell in with the groups, leaving many of the more ground b=
ased Predaons sitting in the shuttle that had picked them up.  

"Sir" Cycl=
onus said to Hydras as he flew along side him, "do you have some where to g=
o, some destination in mind for us?" He asked curiously. "With your base de=
stroyed we have no fall back position."

(TAG)

Preston
